gameDetails.name: Dominion: Hinterlands â€“ Update Pack
gameDetails.description:
Dominion: Hinterlands (Second Edition) contains nine new types of Kingdom cards, which will be released on their own as an update pack for those who own the first edition of this expansion.

The new cards: Berserker, Cauldron, Guard Dog, Nomads, Souk, Trail, Weaver, Wheelwright, Witch's Hut

The following cards included in the first edition should be removed when using the Hinterlands second edition Update Pack:
Cache, Duchess, Embassy, Ill-Gotten Gains, Mandarin, Noble Brigand, Nomad Camp, Oracle, Silk Road

Part of the Dominion series.
